Text.Page: Those blasted argons would destroy this land to satisfy their bizarre hunger for conquest. We have to do something!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'm game."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Excellent! I saw several quernok borers in the Nest of the Shaper. Those look expensive. Destroy them.

We'll see how the argons like losing their possessions!

You came through in fine style. Thanks.

If we don't fight to preserve our dreams, what will we leave our children?
